description: Manage association between a VM and Automanage configuration profile.

commands.name: az automanage configuration-profile-assignment vm create
commands.summary: Create an association between a VM and Automanage configuration profile.
examples: az automanage configuration-profile-assignment vm create -n default -g {rg} --vm-name {vm_name} --configuration-profile {profile_id}

commands.name: az automanage configuration-profile-assignment vm delete
commands.summary: Delete an association between a VM and Automanage configuration profile.
examples: az automanage configuration-profile-assignment vm delete -n default -g {rg} --vm-name {vm_name}

commands.name: az automanage configuration-profile-assignment vm show
commands.summary: Get information about an association between a VM and Automanage configuration profile.
examples: az automanage configuration-profile-assignment vm show -n default -g {rg} --vm-name {vm_name}

commands.name: az automanage configuration-profile-assignment vm update
commands.summary: Update an association between a VM and Automanage configuration profile.
commands.syntax:
az automanage configuration-profile-assignment vm update [--add]
                                                         [--configuration-profile]
                                                         [--configuration-profile-assignment-name]
                                                         [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                         [--ids]
                                                         [--remove]
                                                         [--resource-group]
                                                         [--set]
                                                         [--subscription]
                                                         [--vm-name]
examples: az automanage configuration-profile-assignment vm update --n default -g {rg} --vm-name {vm_name} --configuration-profile {profile_id_2}
